scripts.build: node-utils-file-system-glob-delete "dist/**/*" && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node-utils-file-system-glob-copy ./ dist package.json && node-utils-file-system-glob-copy src dist "**/package.json" && node-utils-file-system-glob-copy ./ dist "messages/**/*"
scripts.messages: npx ts-node src/google-sheet-importer-cli.ts --output-path messages --output-type json --document 1lTpcwU0ubFX7bJFCt8zeHYrwbDaoxNcjzpjUVdmiY_w --worksheet 1 --filterTags intl
